trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_SEQ_00<tab>Alphinaud would enlist your aid in checking on the injured Yok Huy.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_TODO_00<tab>Speak with injured Yok Huy in Worlar's Echo.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_TODO_01<tab>Wait at the designated location.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the temple guard.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_WUKLAMAT_000_001<tab>Stay with me! We'll have a healer see to you soon!
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_KRILE_000_005<tab>There, that should help. Rest awhile, and you'll be back on your feet in no time.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ERENVILLE_000_010<tab>This is a Sharlayan restorative potion. Drink it slowly.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ALISAIE_000_015<tab>You'll be fine. Just try to avoid sudden movements so you don't reopen your wounds.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_KOANA_000_020<tab>Urianger says fire aether pervades the entire village. What happened here...?
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_THANCRED_000_025<tab>Many of the villagers sustained burns, but the fire found no purchase in these stone buildings. A small mercy.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_URIANGER_000_030<tab>Though Valigarmanda's escape is of dire concern, we must needs tend to those caught in the conflagration.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ALPHINAUD_000_035<tab>If you are ready, there are many injured here who need aid. Should you find anyone passed out from their wounds, I ask that you alert me to them.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ALPHINAUD_000_036<tab>Otherwise, I shall be tending to whomever requires the most urgent healing. We can gather here once we've seen to these people's hurts.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ALPHINAUD_000_040<tab>Once we've treated the wounded, I'll have everyone meet at the spot where we were talking earlier.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_YORGERWOR_000_045<tab>You... The Third Promise's protector...
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_YORGERWOR_000_046<tab>Everything was bathed in bright red. A searing heat enveloped my entire body. I couldn't move...
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_YORGERWOR_100_046<tab>What happened to us...?
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ZURFERLAR_000_047<tab><groan>
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ZURFERLAR_000_048<tab>Everything burns... The touch of cloth is agony. Yet I will live. Leave me─there are others in more dire need of help.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ZURFERLAR_100_048<tab>We are fortunate indeed that you and your companions have come.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ZERBORLOR_000_049<tab>Ah...
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ZERBORLOR_000_050<tab>My wounds are nothing serious, but this dryness in my throat... It's as if all the moisture has left my body.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ZERBORLOR_100_050<tab>That strangers from across the salt should be the ones to aid us...
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ALPHINAUD_000_060<tab>I've done all I can for now. The injured you found were awake and alert, then?
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ALPHINAUD_000_061<tab>That is well.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_WUKLAMAT_000_062<tab>We've left the injured as comfortable as we could.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_KRILE_000_063<tab>Many were suffering from burns to a greater or lesser degree. Did a fire sweep through the village?
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ALPHINAUD_000_064<tab>The details are unclear...

TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ALPHINAUD_000_065<tab>Once I'd healed the giant attacked by that mountain bird, the group's leader─Vorporlor, I believe they called him─bade me depart. It was then that I felt an intense wave of aether, and returned to find Worlar's Echo in this state.

TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ALPHINAUD_000_067<tab>I rushed over to the first giant I saw. Though delirious with pain, he repeated the same warning: Valigarmanda had broken free. Thus did I contact you with all haste.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ALISAIE_000_068<tab>Well, we're going to need more information than that before we can deal with the situation.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_WUKLAMAT_000_069<tab>Yes, we should speak with the temple guard, and see what's become of the Skyruin's prison!
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_WUKLAMAT_000_080<tab>We need to find out exactly what's going on!
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_KRILE_000_085<tab>They did say the prison was beginning to fail, but I felt certain it would hold for another few years, at least. Was I mistaken?
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ERENVILLE_000_090<tab>The High Luminary will have returned by now. Hopefully he's found out more than we have...
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ALPHINAUD_000_095<tab>I would be glad to learn that this was all some misunderstanding... A futile hope, by the looks of things.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ALISAIE_000_100<tab>Whatever answers exist await us inside the temple.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_YOKHUYGUARD04889_000_105<tab>The High Luminary grants you entry, and awaits you within.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_KRILE_000_110<tab>Two casters releasing spells of fire at the exact same moment... A feat impossible for any but a two-headed Mamool Ja.

TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ERENVILLE_000_115<tab>When I said I would take on the duties of a guide, that did not include the tracking of ancient and terrible tural vidraal. Still, we can't leave Valigarmanda free to ravage the land.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ALPHINAUD_000_120<tab>Should a claimant reckless enough to free the Skyruin become Dawnservant, what would become of Tuliyollal?
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ALISAIE_000_125<tab>That fiend Bakool Ja Ja─he's rotten through and through! There's nothing “blessed” about him!
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_WUKLAMAT_000_130<tab>So, Erenville. Any ideas on how we can track Valigarmanda?
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ERENVILLE_000_131<tab>The tried-and-true method of comparing sightings with other signs of passage is the most reliable. But also the most time-consuming.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ERENVILLE_000_132<tab>There is a second option... Not as reliable as the first, but if we're lucky, it will let us ascertain the Skyruin's whereabouts far more quickly.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ERENVILLE_000_133<tab>Though a tural vidraal of extraordinary nature, Valigarmanda is still a creature of this world.

TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ERENVILLE_000_134<tab>Like you and me, it is thus sustained by corporeal energy and possesses a unique aetherial balance. Which means this device should come in <var 1A 02 /var>handy<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_WUKLAMAT_100_135<tab>A floating hand!? Now's not the time to be playing with toys!
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ERENVILLE_000_135<tab>This is no toy─it's an aether seeker. As the name suggests, gleaners use it to detect the aether of living beings.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_WUKLAMAT_000_136<tab>And you've had that in your pack this whole time...?

TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ERENVILLE_000_137<tab>I can calibrate it to follow a specific aetherial aspect. The problem with Valigarmanda, however, is that it can shift freely between the elements of fire, ice, or lightning...
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ALPHINAUD_000_138<tab>Well, we know that in order to awaken Valigarmanda from its icy imprisonment, Bakool Ja Ja cast spells which quickened its fire-aspected aether.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ALPHINAUD_000_139<tab>And the residents here were uniformly afflicted by burns.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ALPHINAUD_000_140<tab>Therefore the logical conclusion is that, upon breaking free, Valigarmanda unleashed a great fiery blast.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ERENVILLE_000_141<tab>Then the choice is plain. Fire.

TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ERENVILLE_000_142<tab>The seeker, however, is not without its faults. As we were not able to input our quarry's unique aetheric signature in advance, the device will respond to <var 1A 02 /var>any<var 1A 01 /var> living source of fire-aspected aether.

TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_KRILE_000_143<tab>So, we have the reliable─yet slow─method of information gathering, versus the potentially swift─but easily misled─gleaner tool. I say why not pursue both methods at the same time?
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_WUKLAMAT_000_144<tab>Good idea! We'll have the first to fall back on if the second fails!
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ERENVILLE_000_145<tab>You travel with me, then, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. In case the seeker leads me to some other fiery fiend.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ALISAIE_000_146<tab>The rest of us can stay behind and talk to eyewitnesses. The more Skyruin sightings we can compare, the more accurate our information will be.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ALPHINAUD_000_147<tab>If no one has any objections, I shall remain here in the village and tend to the Yok Huy.

TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ALPHINAUD_100_147<tab>Very few are seriously injured, but I am wary of wounds inflicted by a creature like Valigarmanda. I should like to be close at hand should their condition suddenly worsen.
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_WUKLAMAT_000_148<tab>Right, it sounds like we all have work to do!
TEXT_KINGMB113_04892_ERENVILLE_000_149<tab>We should be on our way as well.
